details: aloo moy
sooo how was it?
that we're finally back together again after 1 year~ish of separation
aku gk nyangka kalo kita bisa balik lagi
so yes
i just want to celebrate this moment with you
did u know why i celebrate this?
i mean if u havent forgot it already, it's 15th of October
it's our first date
well at that time it was kinda awkward
but i'm glad we made it through
yaa walaupun kita pada akhirnya putus krn kesalahan ku dan ketidak dewasaanku
jujur perasaanku skrg itu bahagia pake bgt, ku gk nyangka kl kamu bakal balik lg
aku tu mau bikin pop up surat gitu moy tp belum nemu caranya jadi dari sini ajaya :)
jaadi selamat anniv sayaang! finally lah ya sesudah 1,5 taun struggling, kamu berusaha buat ngehubungin aku lg.
Kaya kita gatau apa yang masa depan siapin buat kita, but i trust u moy.
u r a strong kind and independent woman yang aku yakin bisa hadapin semua yang semesta lempar sama kamu.
aku bakal selalu disini support semua pilihan2mu moyyy. Aku bakal berusaha sebisaku buat cari kerja dan balik nemuin kamu wkwkwwk.
so that we can do all the plans we talked abt. Go see the world together, live with each other, just us against the world no?.
maaf aku gabisa ada disana, jadi sebagai kompensasi aku coba buat ini :) i think its gonna be cute tapi gk tau ya menurut kamu wkwkwkw.
thanks tho for giving me a shot, i appreciate u moyyy and i want the best for a girl like u because u so paking deserve it.
aku bakal coba sebaik yang aku bisa ya moyyy, karena aku mau yang kita jalanin sekarang ini terus sampe kapanpun.
ill try to be the best partner u can get, take a chance with me yes?
for now just enjoy this moment yaaa! dan maaf if its cringe as hell but idgaf wkwkwkw, im looking forward to meeting u babe, cheers!
ah lupa
i love u moyyy
i love u the most moyyy
-Ndut
poem1
💝 Memory Game Time! 💝
Which song did You play for my birthday? 🎵
Choose one:
1. PS I Love You by Paul Partohap
2. I Love You 3000

responses.content: PS I Love You by Paul Partohap

details: 🎉 Correct! You remembered! 🎉
poem2
😅 Almost! But that's not the song...
The correct answer was 'PS I Love You by Paul Partohap'
But don't worry, you still get a special surprise! 💕
poem2
bukan yang ituuuu😡😡😡
